item.title: Classes
item.description: Timetable We get together to learn interesting and useful things at these times: Tuesday: 6.30pm - 7.30pm Friday: 6.30pm - 7.30pm Please arrive at least 15min before the class so your child will have some time to change his clothes. What about prices? Here they are: Joining fee - $0 Annual fee - $0 1 months of classes - $100 Bonuses 1) We offer 2 weeks free trial!

item.title: Contact
item.description: You are welcome to call us on 0432 785 795 or just submit a form below: Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Location
item.description: Our classes are held at Beecroft Uniting Church - 82 Beecroft road, Beecroft. The location is just 5 minutes walking from Beecroft train station or 2 minutes from Beecroft Place. Here is the map: If you have any question, don’t hesitate to call us on 0432 785 795.

item.title: What is Martial Arts for kids
item.description: Martial arts isn’t all about kicking and punching. Violent TV shows and movies might be responsible for some of the bad rap that the sport gets; in reality, martial arts will help your child much more than it will hurt. Whether your kid is bursting with energy or shy in most social situations, martial arts can go a long way toward developing qualities and habits in your young ones that can last a lifetime.
